actionable_insights: Promote holiday packages focused on Christmas markets and winter activities.
Highlight experiences like seeing the Northern Lights in promotional content.
Partner with local ski resorts to offer exclusive discounts for travel bookings.
key_insights: December and January are critical travel months.
Tourists are particularly interested in immersive cultural experiences in winter.
Pricing strategies should account for holiday rush, ensuring optimal bookings 3-4 months in advance.
